DOC.brief_title: Primary Chemotherapy With Anthracycline Followed Nab-paclitaxel Trastuzumab
DOC.detailed_description: Four cycle anthracycline-based regimen follow four cycle Nab-paclitaxel Trastuzumab administrate . Anthracycline-based regimen ( d1 , q3w ) : EC ( Epirubicin 90mg/m2 Cyclophosphamide 600mg/m2 ) AC ( Doxorubicin 60mg/m2 Cyclophosphamide 600mg/m2 ) FEC ( Fluorouracil 500mg/m2 , Epirubicin 100mg/m2 Cyclophosphamide 500mg/m2 ) Nab-paclitaxel 260mg/m2 ( d1 , q3w ) Trastuzumab ( d1 , q3w ) give dose 8 mg/kg IV day 1 first treatment cycle 90 min , subsequently give dose 6 mg/kg 30 min .
